original_text: Sometimes when you go into a town, the people will not accept you. You should then go into the streets of that town and you should say to the people,
korean_text: 어느 동네에 들어가든지 너희를 영접하지 아니하거든 그 거리로 나와서 말하되

sentences.original_text: Sometimes when you go into a town
the people will not accept you
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳 사람들이 너희를 받아들이지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: You should then go into the streets of that town
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 너희는 그 동네의 거리로 나가서

sentences.original_text: and you should say to the people
